44  void KSIntSurfaceDiffuse::ExecuteInteraction( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& aQueue )
45  {
46  double tChoice = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 1. );
47  if( tChoice < fProbability )
48  {
49  ExecuteTransmission( anInitialParticle, aFinalParticle, aQueue );
50  }
51  else
52  {
53  ExecuteReflection( anInitialParticle, aFinalParticle, aQueue );
54  }
55  return;
56  }
57  void KSIntSurfaceDiffuse::ExecuteReflection( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& )
58  {
59  double tKineticEnergy = anInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy();
60 
61  if(fUseRelativeLoss)
62  {
63  tKineticEnergy *= (1.0 - fReflectionLossFraction);
64  }
65  else
66  {
67  tKineticEnergy -= std::fabs(KConst::Q() * fReflectionLoss);
68  }
69 
70  //prevent kinetic energy from going negative
71  if(tKineticEnergy < 0.0)
72  {
73  intmsg( eError ) << "surface diffuse interaction named <" << GetName() << "> tried to give a particle a negative kinetic energy." << eom;
74  return;
75  }
76 
77  //generate angles for diffuse 'Lambertian' reflection direction
78  double tAzimuthalAngle = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 2. * KConst::Pi() );
79  double tSinTheta = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 1. );
80  double tCosTheta = std::sqrt( (1.0 - tSinTheta)*(1.0 + tSinTheta) );
81 
82  KThreeVector tNormal;
83  if( anInitialParticle.GetCurrentSurface() != NULL )
84  {
85  tNormal = anInitialParticle.GetCurrentSurface()->Normal( anInitialParticle.GetPosition() );
86  }
87  else if( anInitialParticle.GetCurrentSide() != NULL )
88  {
89  tNormal = anInitialParticle.GetCurrentSide()->Normal( anInitialParticle.GetPosition() );
90  }
91  else
92  {
93  intmsg( eError ) << "surface diffuse interaction named <" << GetName() << "> was given a particle with neither a surface nor a side set" << eom;
94  return;
95  }
96 
97  KThreeVector tInitialMomentum = anInitialParticle.GetMomentum();
98  double tMomentumMagnitude = tInitialMomentum.Magnitude();
99 
100  KThreeVector tInitialNormalMomentum = tInitialMomentum.Dot( tNormal ) * tNormal;
101  KThreeVector tInitialTangentMomentum = tInitialMomentum - tInitialNormalMomentum;
102  KThreeVector tInitialOrthogonalMomentum = tInitialTangentMomentum.Cross( tInitialNormalMomentum.Unit() );
103 
104  //define reflected direction
105  KThreeVector tReflectedDirection = -1.0*tCosTheta*tInitialNormalMomentum.Unit();
106  tReflectedDirection += tSinTheta*std::cos(tAzimuthalAngle)*tInitialTangentMomentum.Unit();
107  tReflectedDirection += tSinTheta*std::sin(tAzimuthalAngle)*tInitialOrthogonalMomentum.Unit();
108 
109  KThreeVector tReflectedMomentum = tMomentumMagnitude*tReflectedDirection;
110 
111  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
112  aFinalParticle.SetMomentum( tReflectedMomentum );
113  aFinalParticle.SetKineticEnergy( tKineticEnergy );
114 
115  return;
116  }
117  void KSIntSurfaceDiffuse::ExecuteTransmission( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& )
118  {
119  double tKineticEnergy = anInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy();
120 
121  if(fUseRelativeLoss)
122  {
123  tKineticEnergy *= (1.0 - fTransmissionLossFraction);
124  }
125  else
126  {
127  tKineticEnergy -= std::fabs(KConst::Q() * fTransmissionLoss);
128  }
129 
130  //prevent kinetic energy from going negative
131  if(tKineticEnergy < 0.0)
132  {
133  intmsg( eError ) << "surface diffuse interaction named <" << GetName() << "> tried to give a particle a negative kinetic energy." << eom;
134  return;
135  }
136 
137  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
138  aFinalParticle.SetKineticEnergy( tKineticEnergy );
139 
140  return;
141  }
